attributes.action: Impose a Windfall tax of 120% (or more) on Fred Goodwin's immoral pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the Risible Fred Goodwin seems to think that the population of this country owes him a fabulous pension in return for the destruction of a major British company, I see no reason not to return the compliment. I think that we the taxpayers should squeeze him ‘til the pips squeak.
